thread.title: Baba Rahman battles for Chelsea start on training ground after skipping international duty
thread.title_full: Baba Rahman battles for Chelsea start on training ground after skipping international duty

title: Baba Rahman battles for Chelsea start on training ground after skipping international duty
text:
18:55 CET Baba Rahman battles for Chelsea start on training ground after skipping international duty - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
BABA RAHMAN has staked his claim for a starting spot with Chelsea after missing out on international duty with Ghana. 
The left-back has made two starts for the Blues since his Â£21m move from Augsburg over the summer. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
